posts.title: Major traffic jam on MG Road
posts.short_description: Heavy congestion near Brigade Road junction
posts.long_description: There's a massive traffic jam on MG Road near the Brigade Road junction. The congestion extends for about 2 kilometers. Police are directing traffic but it's moving very slowly. Avoid this route if possible.

posts.title: Pothole alert on Koramangala 80ft Road
posts.long_description: There's a huge pothole on Koramangala 80ft Road near the Sony World signal. It's about 2 feet deep and has already caused damage to several vehicles. Please drive carefully or take an alternative route.

posts.title: Metro construction causing delays on Bannerghatta Road
posts.long_description: The ongoing metro construction on Bannerghatta Road is causing significant delays. Traffic is backed up for about 3 kilometers during peak hours. Commuters should add at least 30 minutes to their travel time.

posts.title: Heavy rain causing flooding on Airport Road
posts.long_description: Heavy rainfall has caused severe water logging on Airport Road near the Hebbal junction. The underpass is completely flooded and traffic is being diverted. Avoid this area until the water recedes.

posts.title: Broken traffic signal at Indiranagar 100ft Road
posts.long_description: The traffic signal at the intersection of Indiranagar 100ft Road and 12th Main is not working. Traffic police are manually directing traffic but it's causing confusion and delays. Please drive carefully.

posts.title: Road construction on Sarjapur Road
posts.long_description: Road construction work has started on Sarjapur Road near the Wipro office. Traffic is restricted to single lane in both directions. Expect 20-25 minute delays during peak hours.

posts.title: BMTC bus breakdown on Hosur Road
posts.short_description: Bus blocking traffic near Electronic City
posts.long_description: A BMTC bus has broken down on Hosur Road near Electronic City Phase 1. The bus is partially blocking the road and causing traffic congestion. Traffic police are on the scene trying to clear the road.

posts.title: Accident on Outer Ring Road
posts.long_description: There's been a two-car collision on Outer Ring Road near Marathahalli bridge. The accident is blocking one lane and causing traffic to slow down. Emergency services are on the way.

posts.title: Metro train delay on Purple Line
posts.long_description: Metro trains on the Purple Line are experiencing 15-minute delays due to technical issues at the Baiyappanahalli station. Commuters are advised to plan accordingly or use alternative transport.

posts.title: Sidewalk blocked on Commercial Street
posts.long_description: Construction material from a nearby building site has been left on the sidewalk of Commercial Street. Pedestrians are forced to walk on the road, which is dangerous. Please report to authorities.
